      • findString

        public static int findString(java.lang.String o,
             java.lang.String s,
             int start)
        Finds the first instance of s in line, starting at the position start
        Parameters:
        o - the orignal string
        s - the string to find
        start - the position to start searching. Guaranteed to be in the string line. (precondition)
        Returns:
        the index of the first single instance of s if the string is found OR -1 if it is not found.

      • countStrings

        public static int countStrings(java.lang.String o,
               java.lang.String s)
        Count the number of times instances of s appear in the line.
        Parameters:
        o - the original string
        s - the string to find.
        Returns:
        the number of times the string appears in the line

      • convertItalics

        public static java.lang.String convertItalics(java.lang.String line)
        Replace all instances of underscores in the line given by line with italics tags. There must be an even number of underscores in the line, and they will be replaced by , , alternating.
        Parameters:
        line - a string with 0 or more underscores
        Returns:
        the line that has underscores replaced with tags or the original line if there are not an even number of underscores.
